name: Burning Eyes
description: It was said that all Fire Elf would not blink from the moment they were born. Over time, they all inadvertently have this kind of serious eyes.

name: Burning Hair
description: You will be scalded if you touch hot hair directly with your hand. Do not ask me how I know.

name: Burning Heart
description: The flaming heart, which seemed to be burning and beating, was creepy.

name: Butterfly Wing
description: Severed butterfly wings can be used to create items with magical powers that can move you to a saved location on the map.
